All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArgumentChecker
A utility class that provides methods for checking arguments and throwing IllegalArgumentException if the argument doesn't meet the criteria.
Clear
 
Command
The Command interface represents a command that can be executed.
ConsoleReader
A class that implements the interface to read input from console.
Coordinates
This class represents a set of coordinates with an x and y value.
CustomFileReader
The CustomFileReader class is responsible for reading input from a file.
EndOfInputException
Exception indicating that there is no more input data available to read.
ExecuteScript
 
Exit
 
Help
 
Info
 
Insert
 
InvalidCommandException
Exception indicating that an invalid command was given.
InvalidFileDataException
Exception indicating that the data in a file is invalid.
Invoker
This class is responsible for registering and executing commands.
Main
Entry point for the application.
Movie
A class representing a movie.
MovieArgumentChecker
A utility class that checks the validity of the arguments passed into a Movie object's constructor
MovieCollection
This class represents a collection of movies.
MovieCollectionFileReader
This interface defines methods for reading a MovieCollection object from a file.
MovieCollectionFileWriter
An interface for writing a MovieCollection to a file.
MovieGenre
Enum representing movie genres
MpaaRating
Enum representing the different MPAA ratings
Person
A class representing a Person
PersonArgumentChecker
A utility class that checks the validity of arguments passed to the Person constructor.
PrintAscending
 
PrintDescending
 
PrintFieldDescendingOscarsCount
 
Reader
The Reader interface provides methods to read input data from a source.
Receiver
Receiver class contains the methods that perform the requested commands and manipulate the movie collection.
RemoveGreater
 
RemoveKey
 
RemoveLowerKey
 
ReplaceIfLowe
 
Save
 
Show
 
Update
 
WrongNumberOfArgumentsException
Exception indicating that the wrong number of arguments were provided to a command.
XMLFileReader
A class for reading XML files and creating a MovieCollection object from the data.
XMLFileWriter
The XMLFileWriter class is responsible for writing a movie collection to an XML file.
